amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by the National Park Service in contravention of section 320101 of title 54, United States Code which provides that it is a national policy to preserve for public use historic sites, buildings, and objects of national significance for the inspiration and benefit of the people of the United States, especially as it relates to National Heritage Areas (NHAs).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the National Park Service in contravention of section 320101 of title 54, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A088) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A088) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A088) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A088) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
